00043 void freeSketch(SK_Sketch *sketch)
00044 {
00045     SK_Stroke *stk, *next;
00046 
00047     for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = next)
00048     {
00049         next = stk->next;
00050 
00051         sk_freeStroke(stk);
00052     }
00053 
00054     BLI_freelistN(&sketch->depth_peels);
00055 
00056     MEM_freeN(sketch);
00057 }
00058 
00059 SK_Sketch* createSketch(void)
00060 {
00061     SK_Sketch *sketch;
00062 
00063     sketch = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SK_Sketch), "SK_Sketch");
00064 
00065     sketch->active_stroke = NULL;
00066     sketch->gesture = NULL;
00067 
00068     sketch->strokes.first = NULL;
00069     sketch->strokes.last = NULL;
00070 
00071     return sketch;
00072 }

00074 void sk_initPoint(SK_Point *pt, SK_DrawData *dd, const float no[3])
00075 {
00076     if (no) {
00077         normalize_v3_v3(pt->no, no);
00078     }
00079     else {
00080         pt->no[0] = 0.0f;
00081         pt->no[1] = 0.0f;
00082         pt->no[2] = 1.0f;
00083     }
00084     pt->p2d[0] = dd->mval[0];
00085     pt->p2d[1] = dd->mval[1];
00086     /* more init code here */
00087 }

00089 void sk_copyPoint(SK_Point *dst, SK_Point *src)
00090 {
00091     memcpy(dst, src, sizeof(SK_Point));
00092 }

00094 void sk_allocStrokeBuffer(SK_Stroke *stk)
00095 {
00096     stk->points = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SK_Point) * stk->buf_size, "SK_Point buffer");
00097 }
00098 
00099 void sk_freeStroke(SK_Stroke *stk)
00100 {
00101     MEM_freeN(stk->points);
00102     MEM_freeN(stk);
00103 }

00105 SK_Stroke* sk_createStroke(void)
00106 {
00107     SK_Stroke *stk;
00108 
00109     stk = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SK_Stroke), "SK_Stroke");
00110 
00111     stk->selected = 0;
00112     stk->nb_points = 0;
00113     stk->buf_size = SK_Stroke_BUFFER_INIT_SIZE;
00114 
00115     sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00116 
00117     return stk;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void sk_shrinkStrokeBuffer(SK_Stroke *stk)
00121 {
00122     if (stk->nb_points < stk->buf_size)
00123     {
00124         SK_Point *old_points = stk->points;
00125 
00126         stk->buf_size = stk->nb_points;
00127 
00128         sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00129 
00130         memcpy(stk->points, old_points, sizeof(SK_Point) * stk->nb_points);
00131 
00132         MEM_freeN(old_points);
00133     }
00134 }
00135 
00136 void sk_growStrokeBuffer(SK_Stroke *stk)
00137 {
00138     if (stk->nb_points == stk->buf_size)
00139     {
00140         SK_Point *old_points = stk->points;
00141 
00142         stk->buf_size *= 2;
00143 
00144         sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00145 
00146         memcpy(stk->points, old_points, sizeof(SK_Point) * stk->nb_points);
00147 
00148         MEM_freeN(old_points);
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void sk_growStrokeBufferN(SK_Stroke *stk, int n)
00153 {
00154     if (stk->nb_points + n > stk->buf_size)
00155     {
00156         SK_Point *old_points = stk->points;
00157 
00158         while (stk->nb_points + n > stk->buf_size)
00159         {
00160             stk->buf_size *= 2;
00161         }
00162 
00163         sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00164 
00165         memcpy(stk->points, old_points, sizeof(SK_Point) * stk->nb_points);
00166 
00167         MEM_freeN(old_points);
00168     }
00169 }

00172 void sk_replaceStrokePoint(SK_Stroke *stk, SK_Point *pt, int n)
00173 {
00174     memcpy(stk->points + n, pt, sizeof(SK_Point));
00175 }
00176 
00177 void sk_insertStrokePoint(SK_Stroke *stk, SK_Point *pt, int n)
00178 {
00179     int size = stk->nb_points - n;
00180 
00181     sk_growStrokeBuffer(stk);
00182 
00183     memmove(stk->points + n + 1, stk->points + n, size * sizeof(SK_Point));
00184 
00185     memcpy(stk->points + n, pt, sizeof(SK_Point));
00186 
00187     stk->nb_points++;
00188 }
00189 
00190 void sk_appendStrokePoint(SK_Stroke *stk, SK_Point *pt)
00191 {
00192     sk_growStrokeBuffer(stk);
00193 
00194     memcpy(stk->points + stk->nb_points, pt, sizeof(SK_Point));
00195 
00196     stk->nb_points++;
00197 }
00198 
00199 void sk_insertStrokePoints(SK_Stroke *stk, SK_Point *pts, int len, int start, int end)
00200 {
00201     int size = end - start + 1;
00202 
00203     sk_growStrokeBufferN(stk, len - size);
00204 
00205     if (len != size)
00206     {
00207         int tail_size = stk->nb_points - end + 1;
00208 
00209         memmove(stk->points + start + len, stk->points + end + 1, tail_size * sizeof(SK_Point));
00210     }
00211 
00212     memcpy(stk->points + start, pts, len * sizeof(SK_Point));
00213 
00214     stk->nb_points += len - size;
00215 }

00217 void sk_trimStroke(SK_Stroke *stk, int start, int end)
00218 {
00219     int size = end - start + 1;
00220 
00221     if (start > 0)
00222     {
00223         memmove(stk->points, stk->points + start, size * sizeof(SK_Point));
00224     }
00225 
00226     stk->nb_points = size;
00227 }

00229 void sk_straightenStroke(SK_Stroke *stk, int start, int end, float p_start[3], float p_end[3])
00230 {
00231     SK_Point pt1, pt2;
00232     SK_Point *prev, *next;
00233     float delta_p[3];
00234     int i, total;
00235 
00236     total = end - start;
00237 
00238     sub_v3_v3v3(delta_p, p_end, p_start);
00239 
00240     prev = stk->points + start;
00241     next = stk->points + end;
00242 
00243     copy_v3_v3(pt1.p, p_start);
00244     copy_v3_v3(pt1.no, prev->no);
00245     pt1.mode = prev->mode;
00246     pt1.type = prev->type;
00247 
00248     copy_v3_v3(pt2.p, p_end);
00249     copy_v3_v3(pt2.no, next->no);
00250     pt2.mode = next->mode;
00251     pt2.type = next->type;
00252 
00253     sk_insertStrokePoint(stk, &pt1, start + 1); /* insert after start */
00254     sk_insertStrokePoint(stk, &pt2, end + 1); /* insert before end (since end was pushed back already) */
00255 
00256     for (i = 1; i < total; i++)
00257     {
00258         float delta = (float)i / (float)total;
00259         float *p = stk->points[start + 1 + i].p;
00260 
00261         mul_v3_v3fl(p, delta_p, delta);
00262         add_v3_v3(p, p_start);
00263     }
00264 }

00266 void sk_polygonizeStroke(SK_Stroke *stk, int start, int end)
00267 {
00268     int offset;
00269     int i;
00270 
00271     /* find first exact points outside of range */
00272     for (;start > 0; start--)
00273     {
00274         if (stk->points[start].type == PT_EXACT)
00275         {
00276             break;
00277         }
00278     }
00279 
00280     for (;end < stk->nb_points - 1; end++)
00281     {
00282         if (stk->points[end].type == PT_EXACT)
00283         {
00284             break;
00285         }
00286     }
00287 
00288     offset = start + 1;
00289 
00290     for (i = start + 1; i < end; i++)
00291     {
00292         if (stk->points[i].type == PT_EXACT)
00293         {
00294             if (offset != i)
00295             {
00296                 memcpy(stk->points + offset, stk->points + i, sizeof(SK_Point));
00297             }
00298 
00299             offset++;
00300         }
00301     }
00302 
00303     /* some points were removes, move end of array */
00304     if (offset < end)
00305     {
00306         int size = stk->nb_points - end;
00307         memmove(stk->points + offset, stk->points + end, size * sizeof(SK_Point));
00308         stk->nb_points = offset + size;
00309     }
00310 }
00311 
00312 void sk_flattenStroke(SK_Stroke *stk, int start, int end)
00313 {
00314     float normal[3], distance[3];
00315     float limit;
00316     int i, total;
00317 
00318     total = end - start + 1;
00319 
00320     copy_v3_v3(normal, stk->points[start].no);
00321 
00322     sub_v3_v3v3(distance, stk->points[end].p, stk->points[start].p);
00323     project_v3_v3v3(normal, distance, normal);
00324     limit = normalize_v3(normal);
00325 
00326     for (i = 1; i < total - 1; i++)
00327     {
00328         float d = limit * i / total;
00329         float offset[3];
00330         float *p = stk->points[start + i].p;
00331 
00332         sub_v3_v3v3(distance, p, stk->points[start].p);
00333         project_v3_v3v3(distance, distance, normal);
00334 
00335         copy_v3_v3(offset, normal);
00336         mul_v3_fl(offset, d);
00337 
00338         sub_v3_v3(p, distance);
00339         add_v3_v3(p, offset);
00340     }
00341 }

00343 void sk_removeStroke(SK_Sketch *sketch, SK_Stroke *stk)
00344 {
00345     if (sketch->active_stroke == stk)
00346     {
00347         sketch->active_stroke = NULL;
00348     }
00349 
00350     BLI_remlink(&sketch->strokes, stk);
00351     sk_freeStroke(stk);
00352 }

00354 void sk_reverseStroke(SK_Stroke *stk)
00355 {
00356     SK_Point *old_points = stk->points;
00357     int i = 0;
00358 
00359     sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00360 
00361     for (i = 0; i < stk->nb_points; i++)
00362     {
00363         sk_copyPoint(stk->points + i, old_points + stk->nb_points - 1 - i);
00364     }
00365 
00366     MEM_freeN(old_points);
00367 }

00370 /* Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm for line simplification */
00371 void sk_filterStroke(SK_Stroke *stk, int start, int end)
00372 {
00373     SK_Point *old_points = stk->points;
00374     int nb_points = stk->nb_points;
00375     char *marked = NULL;
00376     char work;
00377     int i;
00378 
00379     if (start == -1)
00380     {
00381         start = 0;
00382         end = stk->nb_points - 1;
00383     }
00384 
00385     sk_allocStrokeBuffer(stk);
00386     stk->nb_points = 0;
00387 
00388     /* adding points before range */
00389     for (i = 0; i < start; i++)
00390     {
00391         sk_appendStrokePoint(stk, old_points + i);
00392     }
00393 
00394     marked = MEM_callocN(nb_points, "marked array");
00395     marked[start] = 1;
00396     marked[end] = 1;
00397     
00398     work = 1;
00399     
00400     /* while still reducing */
00401     while (work)
00402     {
00403         int ls, le;
00404         work = 0;
00405         
00406         ls = start;
00407         le = start+1;
00408         
00409         /* while not over interval */
00410         while (ls < end)
00411         {
00412             int max_i = 0;
00413             short v1[2];
00414             float max_dist = 16; /* more than 4 pixels */
00415             
00416             /* find the next marked point */
00417             while (marked[le] == 0)
00418             {
00419                 le++;
00420             }
00421             
00422             /* perpendicular vector to ls-le */
00423             v1[1] = old_points[le].p2d[0] - old_points[ls].p2d[0]; 
00424             v1[0] = old_points[ls].p2d[1] - old_points[le].p2d[1]; 
00425             
00426 
00427             for ( i = ls + 1; i < le; i++ )
00428             {
00429                 float mul;
00430                 float dist;
00431                 short v2[2];
00432                 
00433                 v2[0] = old_points[i].p2d[0] - old_points[ls].p2d[0]; 
00434                 v2[1] = old_points[i].p2d[1] - old_points[ls].p2d[1];
00435                 
00436                 if (v2[0] == 0 && v2[1] == 0)
00437                 {
00438                     continue;
00439                 }
00440 
00441                 mul = (float)(v1[0]*v2[0] + v1[1]*v2[1]) / (float)(v2[0]*v2[0] + v2[1]*v2[1]);
00442                 
00443                 dist = mul * mul * (v2[0]*v2[0] + v2[1]*v2[1]);
00444                 
00445                 if (dist > max_dist)
00446                 {
00447                     max_dist = dist;
00448                     max_i = i;
00449                 }
00450             }
00451             
00452             if (max_i != 0)
00453             {
00454                 work = 1;
00455                 marked[max_i] = 1;
00456             }
00457             
00458             ls = le;
00459             le = ls + 1;
00460         }
00461     }
00462     
00463 
00464     /* adding points after range */
00465     for (i = start; i <= end; i++)
00466     {
00467         if (marked[i])
00468         {
00469             sk_appendStrokePoint(stk, old_points + i);
00470         }
00471     }
00472 
00473     MEM_freeN(marked);
00474 
00475     /* adding points after range */
00476     for (i = end + 1; i < nb_points; i++)
00477     {
00478         sk_appendStrokePoint(stk, old_points + i);
00479     }
00480 
00481     MEM_freeN(old_points);
00482 
00483     sk_shrinkStrokeBuffer(stk);
00484 }

00487 void sk_filterLastContinuousStroke(SK_Stroke *stk)
00488 {
00489     int start, end;
00490 
00491     end = stk->nb_points -1;
00492 
00493     for (start = end - 1; start > 0 && stk->points[start].type == PT_CONTINUOUS; start--)
00494     {
00495         /* nothing to do here*/
00496     }
00497 
00498     if (end - start > 1)
00499     {
00500         sk_filterStroke(stk, start, end);
00501     }
00502 }

00504 SK_Point *sk_lastStrokePoint(SK_Stroke *stk)
00505 {
00506     SK_Point *pt = NULL;
00507 
00508     if (stk->nb_points > 0)
00509     {
00510         pt = stk->points + (stk->nb_points - 1);
00511     }
00512 
00513     return pt;
00514 }

00516 void sk_endContinuousStroke(SK_Stroke *stk)
00517 {
00518     stk->points[stk->nb_points - 1].type = PT_EXACT;
00519 }

00521 void sk_updateNextPoint(SK_Sketch *sketch, SK_Stroke *stk)
00522 {
00523     if (stk)
00524     {
00525         memcpy(&sketch->next_point, stk->points[stk->nb_points - 1].p, sizeof(SK_Point));
00526     }

00529 int sk_stroke_filtermval(SK_DrawData *dd)
00530 {
00531     int retval = 0;
00532     if (ABS(dd->mval[0] - dd->previous_mval[0]) + ABS(dd->mval[1] - dd->previous_mval[1]) > U.gp_manhattendist)
00533     {
00534         retval = 1;
00535     }
00536 
00537     return retval;
00538 }

00540 void sk_initDrawData(SK_DrawData *dd, const int mval[2])
00541 {
00542     dd->mval[0] = mval[0];
00543     dd->mval[1] = mval[1];
00544     dd->previous_mval[0] = -1;
00545     dd->previous_mval[1] = -1;
00546     dd->type = PT_EXACT;
00547 }

00550 void sk_deleteSelectedStrokes(SK_Sketch *sketch)
00551 {
00552     SK_Stroke *stk, *next;
00553 
00554     for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = next)
00555     {
00556         next = stk->next;
00557 
00558         if (stk->selected == 1)
00559         {
00560             sk_removeStroke(sketch, stk);
00561         }
00562     }
00563 }

00565 void sk_selectAllSketch(SK_Sketch *sketch, int mode)
00566 {
00567     SK_Stroke *stk = NULL;
00568 
00569     if (mode == -1)
00570     {
00571         for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = stk->next)
00572         {
00573             stk->selected = 0;
00574         }
00575     }
00576     else if (mode == 0) {
00577         for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = stk->next)
00578         {
00579             stk->selected = 1;
00580         }
00581     }
00582     else if (mode == 1) {
00583         int selected = 1;
00584 
00585         for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = stk->next)
00586         {
00587             selected &= stk->selected;
00588         }
00589 
00590         selected ^= 1;
00591 
00592         for (stk = sketch->strokes.first; stk; stk = stk->next)
00593         {
00594             stk->selected = selected;
00595         }
00596     }
00597 }
